# Spatio-temporal cluster simulation demonstration

This is a spatio-temporal cluster analysis used to test the R package clustTMB. The analysis uses a spatio-temporal CPUE fishery dataset that was simulated for the [Spatial Assessment Modeling Workshop](https://github.com/aaronmberger-nwfsc/Spatial-Assessment-Modeling-Workshop) project
